title: How to Win a Man's Heart when There Is Competition

steps.title: Men like attention, so give him some by flirting.
steps.content: Men like attention, so give him some by flirting . Go ahead, toss your hair and giggle when he says something funny. These methods have been around for a while because they work! Just make sure you’re being genuine and don’t go overboard. [1] X Research source Break the touch barrier by touching his hand while you talk or lay a hand on his leg while you laugh. Lean in close and speak softly so that he has to lean in, too, in order to hear you. Say something like, "I love you in that color. You look so good tonight." Laughing at his jokes is great, just make sure to only do it when you’re truly amused. If you use a fake laugh, he’ll probably catch on pretty quickly and might be turned off. Even if you’ve already been on a date, keep flirting. [2] X Expert Source Alysha Jeney, MA, LMFT Licensed Relationship Therapist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. It shows him you’re fun and interested.

steps.title: Finding common ground is a great way to let him know you’re the one.
steps.content: Finding common ground is a great way to let him know you’re the one. When you find out that you share an interest, really lean into it. If he mentions that he’s going on a hike, make sure to let him know that it is one of your favorite past times. Just be sure to be genuine. You're amazing the way you are, so you don’t need to fake common interests. If you fake it, you might end up spending all of your time doing things you don’t enjoy. [3] X Research source For example, if he mentions he wants to learn how to cook, don’t pretend to be an expert if you’re not. Instead say, “I’ve always wanted to learn, but I never have. Hey, let’s take a cooking class together!” Look for ways to relate to him. If he mentions that he likes to travel, tell him a fun anecdote about that time you went to France. It's even better if you have a somewhat unique interest in common. If you find out you both are interested in rescuing pugs, for example, make sure to connect over that!

steps.title: A positive attitude is a great way to win him over.
steps.content: A positive attitude is a great way to win him over. When you’re just getting to know someone, don’t dwell on negative stuff. Instead, talk about things in your life that you love. Share your passion for art, talk about your fabulous circle of friends, and tell him about your amazing dog. Basically, talk yourself up and be proud of who you are! Showing that you are upbeat and have a lot of interests lets him know you’re one to watch. [4] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source This doesn’t mean that you have to be fake. If you’re having a rough day, it’s okay to let him know. Just maybe skip the dirty details of that argument with your sister for now.

steps.title: How you hold yourself is important, so pay attention to your body.
steps.content: How you hold yourself is important, so pay attention to your body. You already know that smiling is important, so keep that up. Make sure to stand up straight to show off your confidence, and avoid slouching when you hang out. Another key is to not cross your arms tightly. That indicates you’re closed off. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Whenever you see him, catch his eye and grin.
steps.content: Whenever you see him, catch his eye and grin. It doesn’t matter whether you’re newly acquainted or you’ve known him for ages. Maintaining eye contact is a proven method to let him know you’re interested. [6] X Expert Source Alysha Jeney, MA, LMFT Licensed Relationship Therapist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. Add a genuine smile, and wait for him to reciprocate. [7] X Research source If he doesn’t know that you’re interested, you’ll automatically fall behind in the competition. Let him know you’re in it to win it by being open about the fact that you’re into him.

steps.title: Dress for him, not for your girlfriends.
steps.content: Dress for him, not for your girlfriends. A lot of men aren’t super into fashion trends, so don’t use your meet-ups as a chance to rock that cutting-edge look you’re trying out. Instead, wear something classic such as jeans that fit well and a cute top. The key is to make sure that you feel comfortable so that your confidence radiates. You've got this! [8] X Research source You can still let your personality shine while you’re keeping it elegant. Add a pop of color with fun lipstick or cute shoes.

steps.title: If you’re really interested, don’t wait for him to ask you out.
steps.content: If you’re really interested, don’t wait for him to ask you out. It can feel a little scary to ask a guy out, but it’s a great way to set yourself apart from the competition. When you make the first move, it shows that you’re confident and into him. Make sure that you have a plan when you ask him out. [9] X Research source Instead of saying, “Do you want to hang out sometime?” try something like, “Are you free this Saturday? I’d love to go on a date with you to that new Thai restaurant.” Being specific not only shows you’ve given this some thought, but you’ll also end up with a concrete plan.

steps.title: Ask questions to show you want to know him.
steps.content: Ask questions to show you want to know him. This is a great way to set yourself apart from the competition. Demonstrating your interest lets him know that you’re looking to actually form a bond, not just casually flirt with him. [10] X Research source Ask him about his interests, his friends, and his family. [11] X Expert Source Alysha Jeney, MA, LMFT Licensed Relationship Therapist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. Try starting off with something like, “What are some of your favorite things to do on the weekend?” and then respond by asking another question. For example, if he says that he does volunteer work, say, “Wow, that’s great. What made you become interested in doing that?”

steps.title: No, you don't have to travel anywhere.
steps.content: No, you don't have to travel anywhere. The point is to make this guy feel like he can fully relax around you and leave his worries behind. When you spend time together, focus on having fun and enjoying his company. Come up with unique things to do together to make him realize how great it is to be with you. [12] X Research source Try to make your time together feel really special and fun. Get creative with it and think of things he might like to do. [13] X Expert Source Alysha Jeney, MA, LMFT Licensed Relationship Therapist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. For example, you could invite him "camping." Even if you don't want to pitch a tent in the wilderness, you can create a mini-vacation by talking him to a local park at sunset. Spread out a picnic blanket, toast each other as the sun goes down, and then spend the rest of the evening stargazing.

steps.title: Be open and honest during your conversations.
steps.content: Be open and honest during your conversations. Just because you are focused on being fun and upbeat doesn't mean you can't get deep. [14] X Expert Source Alysha Jeney, MA, LMFT Licensed Relationship Therapist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. Sharing your emotions will help him see that you are serious about him and hopefully help him realize you're the one for him. Share things that are personal to you. If he decides to share with you, be kind and open-minded about what he has to say. [15] X Research source For example, you could tell him that you are really into him. Let him know that you feel giddy and excited around him and that you're hoping to move the relationship forward.

steps.title: Being catty about your competition isn’t a good look.
steps.content: Being catty about your competition isn’t a good look. While it might be tempting to point out your competition’s flaws to make yourself look good, resist the temptation. If you say negative things, it reflects negatively on you. Make sure to be kind and uncritical when you’re with the object of your affection. [16] X Research source Showing that you’re mature lets him know that you’re ready to date him. A bonus to this strategy is that you can feel good about yourself for being a kind person.

steps.title: Don’t be flaky when you have plans.
steps.content: Don’t be flaky when you have plans. Guys typically look for a partner they can count on. In fact, many say it’s a priority in a relationship. Show that you’re dependable by showing up on time and not breaking plans last minute. [17] X Research source You can also show him he can trust you by not repeating things that he tells you in confidence or gossiping about him behind his back.
